column1:
This one is a favorite, so it gets its own recipe mix for convenient indulgence‚Ä¶ It works for fruit or root powders with a sugar content from low (Ube, 10%) to high (Lingonberry, 73%). Counting the pre-made mix as one, it is a 6 ingredients recipe for the final base, including the water. Use 93g of the mix in your final base (or 62g for a regular 16oz tub). > üåø **Vegan & Dairy-free Option**
Replace the SMP & whey with soy protein isolate, and the cottage cheese with silken tofu.

Spun in Light Ice Cream mode, plus a scrape-down and a mix-in run ‚Äî optionally with 10g freeze-dried fruit, e.g. strawberry slices.
Comes out as soft-serve, put it back into the cold for 45min for a firmer consistency.

To make your life easier, take the ‚Äúprep‚Äù ingredients times 5 (see list below), mix them,
and store in an air-tight 1l container (the powder has a low density and needs space).
To mix, take a **BIG** bowl like used for baking, measure the ingredients on a scale,
and whisk them carefully but thoroughly. A ball whisk works best.

1. Take all the ‚Äòprep‚Äô ingredients from your ready-to-use mix ‚Äî the list per tub is just there for reference!
 1. Add the prepared dry ingredients mixed with the chosen fruit powder, and blend *QUICKLY* using an immersion blender on full speed.
